name: Alpacalypse
description:
Alpacalypse is a 3D platformer inspired by PS1/N64-era platformers (mostly Spyro), about an Alpaca avatar of the gods tasked with preventing an impending armageddon via an adorable blood sacrifice.

Below is a link to the first stable prototype build (v0.1.0), intended to demonstrate and test the core mechanics and ideas of the game (platforming movement, yeeting things into big pits). It's very bare-bones and still fairly buggy atm, but hopefully serves to get the idea across enough for some feedback/criticism.

Controls

    WASD (Left stick) to move

    Space (Cross/A) to jump

    Hold shift (Square/X)to charge

    Esc (Options/Start) to pause

    (DEBUG): Q (PS/Xbox button) to force quit, R (Share/Select) to restart level

Controllers are supported, if you've got one lying around please let me know how you get on using one.

Mechanics

    Charge jumping will get you farther

    Charge into sheep to send them flying

    Charge sheep into the pit before the time runs out
